ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS Rebel T3i / 600D 18 MP CMOS APS-C Sensor DIGIC 4 Image Processor Full-HD Movie Mode Digital SLR Camera with 3.0-Inch Clear View Vari-Angle LCD
18.0MP CMOS sensor captures images with exceptional clarity and tonal range and offers great resolution for big enlargements or crops. Features many of the new technologies used by professional cameras to maximize each pixel's light-gathering efficiency.
The Canon DIGIC 4 Image Processor dramatically speeds up the camera's operations and offers improvements in both fine detail and natural color reproduction. It works with the CMOS Sensor to achieve phenomenal levels of performance in nearly any situation
Expanded ISO range makes shooting possible in situations previously impossible without flash. With an ISO rating up to 6400 (expandable to ISO 12800), along with the DIGIC 4 Image Processor's improved noise-reduction technology, creative possibilities abound.
Bright, high resolution, flip-out Vari-angle 3.0" Clear View LCD monitor for shooting at a variety of angles. Freely enables easy angle adjustments even if the camera is mounted on a tripod or has a battery grip attach.
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Digital Rebel T3i - 600D Body
